validation_notes.price_conversion: Trading 212 displays ETF prices in pence (p) but API may return in pounds. Test should handle both formats.
validation_notes.calculation_precision: All calculations should maintain precision to 2 decimal places for currency, 3 for percentages
validation_notes.rounding_rules: Market values and profit/loss should round to nearest penny
validation_notes.display_formatting: Positive values should show + prefix, currency symbols should be preserved

CNX1_EQ.discrepancy_note: Source shows £139.90 and +£6.35 (+4.75%) - may indicate rounding differences or timing
